credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1941, Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
1941, Museum for the Arts of Decoration of the Cooper Union
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, stem and rococo stitches on plain weave foundation
description: A house on top of a hill which rises to the right, with weeping willow trees and other trees, a fence, sheep, a peacock, flying birds and an alphabet; surrounded by an angular strawberry vine border.
name: Sampler
